info.author: Shoma Hosaka
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
boost.lambda like function generator

Usage:

  >>> from pyexpression import _1, _2, _3, if_
  >>> _1 * 10
  <pyexpression.expressions.FuncCall object at 0xb74db7cc>
  >>> (_1 * 10)(5)
  50
  >>> (_1 * _2)(10, 10)
  100
  >>> map(_1[0], zip(range(10), range(10,20)))
  >>> class Test(object):
  ...     def __init__(self):
  ...         self.x = 10
  ...
  >>> (_1.x)(Test())
  10
  >>> x = if_(_1)[_2].else_[_3]
  >>> x(True, 10, 20)
  ... 10
  >>> x(False, 10, 20)
  ... 20
info.name: pyexpression
info.html_description:
boost.lambda like function generator

Usage:

>>> from pyexpression import _1, _2, _3, if_
>>> _1 * 10
<pyexpression.expressions.FuncCall object at 0xb74db7cc>
>>> (_1 * 10)(5)
50
>>> (_1 * _2)(10, 10)
100
>>> map(_1[0], zip(range(10), range(10,20)))
>>> class Test(object):
...     def __init__(self):
...         self.x = 10
...
>>> (_1.x)(Test())
10
>>> x = if_(_1)[_2].else_[_3]
>>> x(True, 10, 20)
... 10
>>> x(False, 10, 20)
... 20
